text: Our hearts go out to the people of Ukraine as they face another day of relentless attacks on their energy infrastructure. The international community must act swiftly and decisively to provide critical military aid, strengthening Ukraine's air defenses and deterring further Russian aggression. We stand with Ukraine in their fight for sovereignty, democracy, and self-determination. #StandWithUkraine ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¦
